entry.title: Testing apps with third-party integrations
entry.summary:
Description

Mike Solomon is the C.E.O. of Meeshkan, a company that makes tools for developers based in Helsinki, Finland. Mike is a Python, JavaScript, Haskell, C++ and Scheme developer that cut his teeth on the LilyPond project and has since worked on numerous projects ranging from open source to large commercial products. In the Python world, his main interests are testing, SMT solvers, and machine learning.

entry.title: Scalability at YouTube
entry.summary:
Summary

This talk covers scalability at YouTube. It's given by one of the original engineers at YouTube, Mike Solomon. It's a rare glimpse into the heart of YouTube which is one of the largest websites in the world, and one of the few extremely large websites to be written in Python.
